title: cmd/gc: optimize zeroing code
body:
Keith fixed up the prologue zeroing code to remove REP when possible. In addition to his
CL (77920043) we can consult the bitmaps to see exactly which words need a zero store in
the non-REP case.

https://golang.org/cl/14430048/diff/280001/src/cmd/6g/ggen.c has the original
code (in the deleted part).
